channel.title: Windows Vista vs Windows XP! Which is better?
channel.description:
I just got a 320 GB Hard Drive with 3GB memory, and dual core processors. The only problem is, it comes with Windows Vista. I've heard alot of bad things about Vista, but could someone narrow it down for me. What makes XP better than Vista? And the only reason I don't just install XP on to the new computer is that if I do, they said that my computer will run 20% slower than what it did with Vista...
HELP!

item.title: Windows Vista vs Windows XP! Which is better?
item.dc:creator: @nicatron nicatron
item.description:
@nicatron wrote:

Vista makes 3GB look like 20MB… I’d rather use 3GB on XP than 20MB on Vista

Read full topic
item.source: Windows Vista vs Windows XP! Which is better?

item.title: Windows Vista vs Windows XP! Which is better?
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

I would go for XP, thing is that would most likely void the warranty, least it did with my friends pc, I don’t know the numbers, but from what I have seen vista is slower, and gets slower the older it gets.

Read full topic
item.source: Windows Vista vs Windows XP! Which is better?
